#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#define SIZE 500

using namespace std;

char str1[SIZE] ;
char str2[27] ;

void doThis(){
    gets ( str1 ) ;
    gets ( str2 ) ;
    int len = strlen ( str1 ) ;
    for ( int i = 0 ; i < len ; i++ ){
        if ( ( str1[i] >= 'A' ) && ( str1[i] <= 'Z' ) ){
            int index = str1[i] - 'A' ;
            printf ( "%c" , str2[ index ] ) ;
        }
        else{
            printf ( "%c" , str1[i] ) ;
        }
    }
    printf ( "\n" ) ;
}

int main()
{
    #ifdef pooja
    freopen("D:\\CODING\\CC\\in.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("D:\\CODING\\CC\\out.txt","w",stdout);
    freopen("D:\\CODING\\CC\\out.txt","w",stderr);
    #endif

    int t ;
    scanf ( "%d\n" , &t ) ;
    while(t--){
        doThis() ;
    }
    return 0;
}
